Gerard Hair
Est. 1977
  • Services
  • Team

  • Info / Contact

Creating individual cuts, tailored to your own unique style

Opening in 1977 and situated in the picturesque market town of Grantham in Lincolnshire, here at Gerard's our staff have a wealth of experience enabling them to create an individual cut, tailored to your own unique style. We specialise in modern cuts and colour, with an emphasis on the long-term condition of your hair. All of our products contain gentle, nourishing, natural ingredients and avoid any harsh or damaging chemical additives. The combination of our technical skills and the naturally enriching products we use ensures that your hair looks its best on the days and weeks following your appointment.

Creating individual cuts, tailored to your own unique style

Modern cuts and colour, with an emphasis on the long-term condition of your hair

Our products contain gentle, nourishing, natural ingredients

Opening in 1977 and situated in the picturesque market town of Grantham in Lincolnshire, here at Gerard's our staff have a wealth of experience enabling them to create an individual cut, tailored to your own unique style. We specialise in modern cuts and colour, with an emphasis on the long-term condition of your hair. All of our products contain gentle, nourishing, natural ingredients and avoid any harsh or damaging chemical additives. The combination of our technical skills and the naturally enriching products we use ensures that your hair looks its best on the days and weeks following your appointment.
